item.title: Roblox: Fire Force Reignition Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Fire Force Reignition Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Fire Force Reignition
  • How to Get More Fire Force Reignition Codes

Fire Force Reignition is an adventure RPG where you will have to travel around the open world, kill enemies, and constantly improve your character. As in similar Roblox experiences, a lot depends on your build, which consists not only of armor and weapons but also a bunch of different abilities and upgrade trees.

By redeeming Fire Force Reignition codes, you will get a great opportunity to improve your position in the game by getting different rerolls for your abilities. Hurry up, because codes have a certain expiration date, after which they become invalid and do not offer rewards.

Updated May 24, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Fire Force Reignition just dropped three fresh codes, giving you reroll tokens and an ability reroll to shake up your gameplay. These rewards can help you test out new abilities or fine-tune your setup without grinding too hard. Make sure to grab them soon before they expire. Stick around for even more updates and future rewards.

All Fire Force Reignition Codes

Working Fire Force Reignition Codes

  • BREAKINGBARRIERS - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens. (NEW)
  • MBALL - Redeem this code to get 1 Ability Reroll. (NEW)
  • SUPERPATCH - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens. (NEW)

Expired Fire Force Reignition Codes

  • MOMMY - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • FOOL - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • REIGNITION2 - Redeem this code to get one Ability Reroll, 100 Reroll Tokens, and one Generation Reroll.
  • 55KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • REIGNITION - Redeem this code to get four Ability Rerolls, 100 Reroll Tokens, and two Generation Rerolls.

Redeeming Fire Force Reignition codes will be useful at every stage of the game. So, no matter if you are a beginner or an advanced player, don't neglect it and be sure to take advantage of the opportunity to get some freebies.

How to Redeem Codes for Fire Force Reignition

Redeeming Fire Force Reignition codes is a little more difficult than in other Roblox games, but this is only because it is not clear how to find the right option. If you also still don't understand how it works, don't worry because we have prepared a step-by-step guide:

  • Launch Fire Force Reignition and log in to the server.
  • Press the M key to open the menu.
  • Among the buttons listed, interact with the first one, with the gear icon.
  • This will open the Settings menu. At the bottom of the menu, you'll see a small redemption section consisting of an input field and a green Go button next to it. Now, copy and paste one of the active codes in the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Go button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Fire Force Reignition Codes

To find more Fire Force Reignition codes, you will only need to visit the game's official pages on social media. The game's developers often share new Roblox codes, so if you are careful enough, you can easily find them among other content:

  • Official Fire Force Reignition Roblox group.
  • Official Fire Force Reignition Discord server.
Roblox

item.title: Who Is The Queen Of Fortnite?
item.description:
The Fortnite community is huge; there are millions of players around the world, pro players competing in tournaments, and streamers with thousands of fans that help to keep the live-service game within the cultural zeitgeist. While there are a number of popular streamers and pro Fortnite players, there is only one who has truly adopted the title of the Queen of Fortnite.

Some fans may wonder if this informal title is related to their link to the development of the game or an in-game character. However, the answer is actually much simpler than that.

Who Is The Queen Of Fortnite?

The Queen of Fortnite is Whitney Singleton, also known as KeepUpRadio . Born in Buffalo, New York, Singleton has become a big name and personality within the Fortnite community thanks to her songs, dances, and other influencer content based around the game.

The word 'clout' is now somewhat synonymous with her persona, even being listed in her TikTok profile as her raps and songs often talk about her influence within the Fortnite community. C.L.O.U.T is one of her most popular songs, but fans may also know her from the Tilted Tower Dance, which, despite the name, started as a song.

As well as these original songs based on the Battle Royale title, Singleton has also taken her musical talents and remixed popular songs with a Fortnite twist. She streams the game on Twitch, playing with her viewers to maintain her community, and while she still posts Fortnite content, she's often doing something alongside it, such as learning about Tate McRae or the history of the Met Gala.

According to SocialBlade, her YouTube channel brings in an estimated $45,000-$726,000 per year, but no such figures exist for her TikTok channel. Nevertheless, these revenue figures should always be taken with a pinch of salt, given they're known not to be very accurate.

All KeepUpRadio Social Channels & Platforms

The Queen of Fortnite is active on various social media channels and content platforms, such as YouTube, Twitch, TikTok, Twitter, and Bluesky. Her largest followings are on YouTube and TikTok , where she has 1.66 million subscribers and 1.3 million followers, respectively. Her full list of platforms can be found below:

  • Bluesky
  • Discord
  • Instagram
  • Snapchat
  • TikTok
  • Twitch
  • Twitter (X)
  • YouTube

Does KeepUpRadio Have a Fortnite Skin or Item Set?

At the time of writing, KeepUpRadio doesn't have an Icon skin in Fortnite . Icon skins are given to popular figures in real life who make their way into the game, such as Ninja, Travis Scott, Mr. Beast, Lewis Hamilton, and Eminem.

While the Queen of Fortnite doesn't have an Icon skin, there is a KeepUpRadio locker bundle . This includes a 'Kyra' skin, which has some resemblances to Singleton, but it isn't as similar to her appearance as we've seen Icon skins compared to their real-life counterparts. The set also includes the Impact Green back bling, Melty Gold wrap, and the Brush Your Shoulders and Amazing Cube emotes.

The bundle hasn't been in rotation since its original three-day release period in the Fortnite Item Shop in February 2023.

item.title: An Open-World Resident Evil Could End Up ‘Stealing’ a Silent Hill 2 Remake Trick
item.description:
Summary

  • Capcom is likely working on Resident Evil 9, potentially with an open-world format.
  • RE9, if open-world, would need to carefully balance enemy encounters with the level of available supplies.
  • Silent Hill 2 Remake included resources hidden in plain sight via breakable car windows, a design choice RE9 could also implement.

Excepting a brief hidden tease in a recent video celebrating the remake of the fourth main entry selling 10 million copies, Capcom has been very quiet about Resident Evil . Assumptions are that the developer is currently working on Resident Evil 9 , along with potentially more remakes, according to unconfirmed rumors. And while some firm information has come to light, such as RE7 director Koshi Nakanishi taking the role again for the ninth numbered installment, the studio hasn't offered much else in the way of Resident Evil news.

Nevertheless, the series continues to have a strong presence, riding high on the reception and sales of the remakes and modern entries. In 2024, it was joined by another IP that was often viewed as the other side of Resident Evil 's survival horror coin. The Silent Hill 2 Remake was a success on many fronts, presenting a new perspective and expanded version of the beloved classic while remaining true to the spirit and emotional impact of the original. Silent Hill 2 Remake got a lot of things right , and one seemingly minor inclusion might be the perfect thing for RE9 to also employ, if rumors about it being open-world hold water.

Both franchises are also set to receive new film adaptations.

If Resident Evil 9 Goes Open-World, It Can Take Inspiration from Silent Hill 2 Remake's Approach to Supplies

Silent Hill 2 Remake Hid Extra Resources in Plain Sight

Bloober Team's reimagining of the desolate fog-covered streets and eerily empty buildings of the town in Silent Hill 2 Remake did a great job of preserving the atmosphere and layout that many fans were familiar with. As James Sunderland frantically searches for his wife Mary, he is forced to battle the bizarre and warped manifestations that increasingly appear throughout. In classic genre fashion, players must carefully manage their inventory and check every nook and cranny to ensure they have enough health and ammo to make it through each portion.

In the sections where James can freely explore the town, he can smash many of the abandoned cars' windows for extra supplies; something that players may not notice or be aware of at first, as the game doesn't go out of its way to make this clear. It was a perhaps a more subtle but welcome design choice in Silent Hill 2 Remake , and one that could be a great help. It provides a safety net of sorts should players find themselves in dire need of additional items, and is a great way of having additional resources on hand. Resident Evil 9 could then replicate this in some form to do the same.

An Open-World Resident Evil Could Make Great Use of Silent Hill 2 Remake's 'Hidden' Items

One major rumor, according to a longtime leaker, claims that Resident Evil 9 will be "more ambitious", along the lines of how RE4 and later RE7 revolutionized the franchise. Even before this, though, many suspected that Capcom was finally looking to take the series into an open-world format, which would indeed be an ambitious tradition-breaking choice for it.

If Resident Evil is truly taking the plunge into open-world territory, it certainly will have to contend with a few major considerations to its usual formula. Keeping the tension going in a much wider world where fans may be freer to explore and approach combat situations at a different pace than normal will require a delicate approach. RE9 will need to ensure that both enemy encounters and supplies are carefully balanced so as not to tip the scales in favor of being too easy or difficult. Having supplies scattered across the world in somewhat tucked-away places like Silent Hill 2 Remake would be a good compromise to do so.

This need not be exactly the same with only vehicles providing them, but something that is functionally similar, like the crates and barrels in RE4 , would fit well within a hypothetical open-world Resident Evil . The game may not telegraph that this is the case, but diligent players will discover them, and it would be both believable and mechanically sound for RE9 to take a cue from Silent Hill 2 Remake in this regard.

item.title: Roblox: Mini City Tycoon Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Mini City Tycoon Codes
  • How to Redeem Mini City Tycoon Codes
  • How to Get More Mini City Tycoon Codes

If you've ever wanted to build and manage your own city, then Mini City Tycoon is what you need. This experience offers players the opportunity to build a dream city from scratch. But it's not that easy, since you need to keep an eye on the needs of your residents. And to speed up the city's development, you can use Mini City Tycoon codes.

As expected from Roblox codes, they grant players valuable rewards, among which you can find currencies, including Diamonds. You will need them to unlock some upgrades. But hurry, since their validity period is limited.

All Mini City Tycoon Codes

Working Mini City Tycoon Codes

  • FIRST - Redeem this code to get 50 Diamonds
  • BUG - Redeem this code to get 50 Diamonds

Expired Mini City Tycoon Codes

There are no expired codes in Mini City Tycoon . We will update this article as soon as more code becomes available.

When you start playing Mini City Tycoon , you will only have access to a flat piece of land. Depending on your chosen map, it may have rivers or lakes, but otherwise, it will be empty. You will have to lay roads, build facilities, and residential buildings. During this, your residents will tell you what they lack, such as electricity or entertainment. And the happier the residents are, the more income your city will bring. However, while most purchases require Cash, some can only be obtained for Diamonds. Luckily, with the help of Mini City Tycoon codes, you can quickly get this currency.

Almost all codes in this experience contain Diamonds. Even a few of them will be enough to get enough currency for several upgrades, such as buying rare cars. However, their validity is limited in time, so you will want to use them before they expire.

How to Redeem Mini City Tycoon Codes

The code redemption feature in Mini City Tycoon is available from the first minutes of the game. Like most other Roblox experiences, you just need to complete the tutorial to get free rein and get free rewards. For convenience, follow these steps:

  • Launch Mini City Tycoon .
  • Then, open Settings by clicking on the gear icon on the right side of the screen.
  • Next, go to the codes tab by clicking on the button with a check mark.
  • After that, enter the code and press Enter to claim the reward.

How to Get More Mini City Tycoon Codes

Like other Roblox games, Mini City Tycoon gets new codes when players reach certain community milestones. So you should start following the official developer pages. There, they post both news about upcoming updates and all the latest codes:

  • Aurion Games Roblox group
  • Aurion Games Discord server

item.title: Roblox: Superhero Legends Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Superhero Legends Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Superhero Legends
  • How to Get More Superhero Legends Codes

Superhero Legends is an incremental simulator where you will be in the role of a superhero, and your goal will be to increase your strength and save the world from disaster. To prevent a catastrophe, you will have to train a lot and invest a bunch of Gems to achieve better results and buy new equipment.

To facilitate the process of development in this Roblox experience, you can redeem Superhero Legends codes that we have collected for you. Each code contains exclusive rewards ranging from Gems to booster potions, extra Power, and even Rebirth Tokens.

All Superhero Legends Codes

Working Superhero Legends Codes

  • UPDATE1 - Redeem this code to get 100,000 Gems.
  • BETA - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Aura, Strength, and Speed Power.
  • POTIONS - Redeem this code to get Speed, Aura, and Strength Potions.
  • SECRET - Redeem this code to get 25 Rebirth Tokens.

Expired Superhero Legends Codes

There are currently no expired Superhero Legends codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

To save the world in Superhero Legends , you need to constantly increase your Power through numerous training sessions. Redeeming codes can make this process much easier, as you'll get tons of resources, currency, and boosters to help you do so.

How to Redeem Codes for Superhero Legends

Redeeming codes in Superhero Legends is not difficult, as the developers have made this process simple and accessible. To help you avoid any difficulties and save time, check out our guide on how to redeem rewards in this Roblox game:

  • Launch Superhero Legends .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be a bunch of buttons and options arranged in two columns. Among them, interact with the last one in the second column, which says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a yellow Submit button below it. Now, enter one of the working codes mentioned above in the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the yellow Submit button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear above the redemption menu with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Superhero Legends Codes

Similar to the creators of other Roblox games, the developers of Superhero Legends share new codes on the game's official social media pages. If you visit and monitor them carefully, you may be lucky enough to find fresh codes that you haven't used before.

  • Official Superhero Legends Roblox group.
  • Official Superhero Legends Discord server.
